title: Agent Hub Consolidation — Unify orchestration tools under agent-hub/

comment:

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: CRITICAL FINDING. The following execution-phase placeholders remain unresolved:

- EI-1: "[SUMMARY]", "[Pass/Fail]", "[PERFORMER] - [DATE]"
- EI-2: "[SUMMARY]", "[Pass/Fail]", "[PERFORMER] - [DATE]"

PROCEDURAL NON-COMPLIANCE (SOP-002 Section 7.3):
A CR may only be routed for post-review when ALL of the following are met:
1. "Execution Complete: All execution items have Task Outcome of Pass, or Fail outcomes are documented via Variance Report" -- FAILED. No Task Outcomes are recorded. All six EIs show "[Pass/Fail]".
2. "Evidence Documented: Completion evidence is recorded in the CR's Execution Summary column" -- FAILED. All six EIs show "[SUMMARY]" with no evidence.

EVIDENCE OF EXECUTION:
Git commit fcf077d ("CR-069 IN_EXECUTION: Agent Hub Consolidation") exists on main, confirming that code changes were implemented. However, this evidence has not been documented in the CR itself.

REQUIRED CORRECTIVE ACTIONS:
1. Check out CR-069 and populate ALL six EI rows with: execution summaries describing what was done and referencing commit(s), Task Outcome (Pass/Fail), and performer/date.
2. Complete the Execution Summary (Section 11) with an overall narrative.
3. Either populate or remove the placeholder row in the Execution Comments table.
4. Check in and re-route for post-review.

DETERMINATION: NON-COMPLIANT. The CR was routed for post-review with zero execution documentation completed. One failed item is sufficient for rejection; this review identifies eight distinct placeholder violations across Sections 10 and 11.

POST-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All verification items pass.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Agent Hub Consolidation — Unify orchestration tools under agent-hub/" -- present, non-empty.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: None found. Searched for TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX, [SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], [PERFORMER], [DATE], [COMMENT], [EXECUTION_SUMMARY] -- zero matches in the document.

EXECUTION TABLE VERIFICATION (SOP-002 Section 7.3, SOP-004):
- EI-1 (Phase 1: File moves): Pass. Summary documents git mv operations for docker/, agent-gui/, git_mcp/; creation of logs/.gitkeep; deletion of .claude/docker/, .pid, and .log files.
- EI-2 (Phase 2: Path fixes): Pass. Summary documents config.py property additions, container.py path fixes (3 lines), docker-compose.yml volume mount updates, shell script rewrites. Validated with docker-compose config.
- EI-3 (Phase 3: services.py and CLI): Pass. Summary documents services.py creation (~420 lines), 3 new CLI subcommands, 9 total subcommands verified via agent-hub --help, smoke test of agent-hub services.
- EI-4 (Phase 4: Config/dependency/gitignore): Pass. Summary documents .gitignore updates, pyproject.toml mcp dependency, requirements.txt watchdog removal, git check-ignore verification.
- EI-5 (Phase 5: Documentation): Pass. Summary documents CLAUDE.md, docker/README.md, CONTAINER-GUIDE.md, and agent-hub/README.md updates.
- EI-6 (Phase 6: Final cleanup): Pass. Summary documents git rm of launch.sh and pd-status. References commit fcf077d (73 files changed).

All six EIs have Task Outcome of Pass. No Fail outcomes, so no VARs required. No VARs found (confirmed via filesystem search).

EXECUTION COMMENTS: Two comments recorded with performer/date signatures. First documents pre-execution service teardown. Second documents single-commit execution strategy.

EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11): Complete narrative summarizing all six phases, noting no deviations from plan, and referencing verification evidence (docker-compose config, agent-hub --help, agent-hub services smoke test, commit fcf077d).

EVIDENCE VERIFICATION (independent spot checks):
- Commit fcf077d exists on main: confirmed. 73 files changed, 1519 insertions, 721 deletions. Commit message matches CR-069 scope.
- launch.sh: confirmed DELETED from working tree.
- pd-status: confirmed DELETED from working tree.
- .claude/docker/: confirmed DELETED from working tree.
- agent-hub/docker/: confirmed EXISTS.
- agent-hub/gui/: confirmed EXISTS.
- agent-hub/mcp-servers/git_mcp/: confirmed EXISTS.
- agent-hub/agent_hub/services.py: confirmed EXISTS.
- agent-hub/logs/.gitkeep: confirmed EXISTS.
- CLAUDE.md: confirmed updated with new paths (docker/ -> agent-hub/docker/, agent-hub launch quick start added).

BLOCKING VARs: None. All EIs passed.

DOCUMENTATION: CLAUDE.md (uncontrolled document) updated per scope. No QMS-controlled documents (SOPs, RS, RTM) were modified under this CR.

SDLC PREREQUISITES (SOP-002 Section 7.3 item 5): Not applicable. CR-069 modifies agent orchestration infrastructure (agent-hub/), not SDLC-governed systems (QMS CLI).

TRACEABILITY: References SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, and related CRs (CR-062, CR-063, CR-068).

FORMATTING: Consistent throughout. Section numbering correct. Markdown tables well-formed. Code blocks properly formatted.

TYPOS/ERRORS: None found.

DETERMINATION: COMPLIANT. Recommend for post-approval.
